Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Jingtailong International Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Beijing, convenient to Dashilan Street and Tiananmen Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Dazhalan and Beijing Planning Exhibition Hall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 306 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a health club, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands. This hotel also features a hair salon and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 2 PM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Jingtailong International Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Beijing, convenient to Dashilan Street and Tiananmen Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Dazhalan and Beijing Planning Exhibition Hall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Dashilan Street - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Dazhalan - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Beijing Planning Exhibition Hall - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Colored Glaze Factory Cultural Street - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Lao She Teahouse - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Front Gate - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Tianqiao Acrobatics Theatre - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Chairman Mao Memorial Hall - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Temple of Heaven - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Tiananmen Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Peking Opera - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
National Museum of China - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
China Museum of History - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Beijing Goldenport Motor Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Great Hall of the People - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for Jingtailong International Hotel is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 26.6 km / 16.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
